Reauthenticate Tests

Test function provided for reauthentication.

This page tests that a provided onSessionExpired function is called when the session key is invalidated. the provided handler leaves a marker on the page, then calls the authenticate function passed to it. We check for the marker to verify the function was called. This page:

  • Checks that login succeeds
  • Checks that a search manager can get data
  • Checks that a new login happens if the sessionKey was invalidated
  • Checks that a search manager can get data after the new login
  • Checks the marker left by the onSessionExpired function is present

Steps:

Click the button. Things will turn red, then back to green. If they settle on green you're good.

Invalidate login
